Missouri_City.KTBZ-FM: KTBZ-FM (94.5 MHz "94.5 The Buzz") is a commercial FM radio station licensed to Houston, Texas. It is owned by iHeartMedia, Inc., and airs an Alternative Rock radio format. KTBZ-FM's studios are located at 2000 West Loop South, Suite 300 in Uptown Houston, with its transmitter located in Missouri City.
